node.title: Meet the detective who found Cleo Smith
node.alt: A man in headshot smiles at the camera.
node.description: Cameron Blaine has worked on some of WA's most high-profileÂ murders, and his appearance in a heartwarming police video of the moments after Cleo Smith was found has endeared him to many.
node.content:
["You might not know his name, but\u00a0Detective Senior Sergeant\u00a0Cameron Blaine has been involved in some of the biggest cases in\u00a0West Australian policing history.", "One of the state's top homicide detectives, he's interviewed some of WA's worst killers and been an integral part of many major policing investigations.", "So it was no surprise to learn that he was one of four officers on the scene\u00a0when four-year-old\u00a0Cleo Smith was rescued from a Carnarvon house in the early hours of Wednesday morning.", "He's the one in the heartwarming video released by police yesterday of the moment Cleo was found.", "", "
The police rescue of Cleo Smith was captured by body cameras.
", "In the 11-second clip, Cleo is carried by another officer, while\u00a0Senior Sergeant Blaine gently speaks with her.", "\"Cleo, my name's Cameron, are you OK?\" he asks the four-year-old.", "Her arms firmly around the officer, Cleo nods her head.", "\"We're going to take you to see your mummy and daddy, is that good?\" he says.", "
'Incredible' moment of Cleo rescue
", "Minutes before, Senior Sergeant Blaine had helped force entry into the locked house in the working class suburb of Brockman, finding Cleo sitting in a bedroom.", "Describing that moment, he said it was \"absolutely fantastic to see her sitting there\u00a0in the way that she was, it was incredible.\"", "", "
\"My name is Cleo,\"\u00a0four-year-old Cleo Smith told Cameron Blaine.
", "\"I asked her what her name was. One of the guys jumped in front of me and picked her up and I just wanted to be absolutely sure that ...\u00a0it was her.", "\"I said, 'What is your name?'", "\"She didn't answer.", "\"I asked three times and then she looked at me and said, 'My name is Cleo.'\"", "", "
Cameron Blaine describes the moment he found Cleo Smith.
", "Asked whether it was the best moment of his career, Senior Sergeant Blaine said: \"Without a doubt.\"", "It's a big call for an officer whose career has been little short of stellar.", "
Detective worked on infamous murder cases
", "Senior Sergeant Blaine was one of the lead detectives on the gruesome case of Aaron Pajich, who was murdered by\u00a0Jemma Lilley and her accomplice, Trudi Lenon.", "Mr Pajich, 18, was lured to Lilley's Perth home in 2016, where he was stabbed and garrotted by the women, one of whom was obsessed with serial killers,\u00a0and buried in the backyard.", "", "
Aaron Pajich was lured to his death by Jemma Lilley and Trudi Lenon in 2016.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "In the same year, Perth father Ernest Fisher murdered his own son, Matthew\u00a0Fisher-Turner, using\u00a0knives to stab him to death before leaving his body at the family home for his other children to dispose of while he went to watch the AFL grand final.", "It was Senior Sergeant Blaine who conducted the crucial interviews with Fisher, in which he admitted killing his \"arsehole\" son.", "", "
Ernest Fisher stabbed his son Matthew Fisher-Turner to death.(ABC News)
", "Another of his infamous cases was the body-in-the-boot murder of Travis Mills, who was bashed unconscious at his home and put in the boot of a car that was later set on fire.", "Five people were ultimately convicted of that murder, thanks in part to Senior Sergeant Blaine's efforts.", "
Detective on the scene early
", "When a little girl went missing in seemingly inexplicable circumstances on October 16, Cameron Blaine was on the first plane to Carnarvon from Perth.", "The homicide officer must have been expecting the worst when he arrived at the Blowholes campsite, and as the days dragged on without a result, that feeling probably intensified.", "", "
The Blowholes campground was closed while police combed through the low shrubs surrounding the area.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "But on Tuesday night he and his team got the crucial evidence they had been waiting for, information that led them to force down the door of a nondescript house in the Carnarvon suburb of Brockman a bit after midnight.", "As Senior Sergeant Blaine told the media in a buoyant press conference,\u00a0\"things developed so quickly\" there was no time to let Cleo's parents know what was happening.", "\"And we didn't want to give them any false expectations about what might happen,\" he said.", "\"We didn't know ourselves. It is always a delicate process when it comes to that.\"", "", "
Police forced their way into the Carnarvon home where Cleo Smith was found.
", "What did happen was that the little girl, missing for 18 long days in a sparsely populated part of the country, was finally found alive and apparently in good physical health.", "\"To be able to give them [Cleo's parents] that\u00a0news and say they can make their way to the hospital and we will meet them there ... that was fantastic,\" he said.", "\"It was an honour to be able to witness that reunion.", "\"So many of the guys had been doing long days and long hours. We are only the pointy end here, but we are backed by a massive\u00a0task force.", "\"It was certainly an honour to see that reunion and have a part in it.\"", "The happy outcome to the baffling case was \"a really good experience\", he said, but it's not over yet.", "If the\u00a036-year-old man in police custody is ultimately charged, Senior Sergeant Blaine and his team will\u00a0begin the arduous task of building a case of evidence that can be used in a court of law.", "\"There are a lot of things left in the investigation,\" he said."]
